projects.name: Ghost Time Games presents: Soul Power
projects.blurb: Soul Power follows the dark and mysterious story of a ghost in the afterlife with challenging physics-based 2D platforming.

projects.name: MONSTERMATIC: The First 3D Printing Game
projects.blurb: The FIRST MOBILE GAME that allows users to create and 3D print custom designed monsters.

projects.name: Emerald
projects.blurb: Reactivate a derelict spaceship in zero-G. Experience memories from your past. A story-based action-adventure game for PC, Mac & Linux.

projects.name: Steam Squad
projects.blurb: Steam Squad is a turn-based wargame for PC, Mac and Linux. It takes place in an alternate universe during World War I.

projects.name: Slip
projects.blurb: Slip is a fast paced side scrolling platformer for PC and Mac. Swap between two colors to avoid danger.

projects.name: Sweet Math
projects.blurb: Sweet Math introduces a sweet and exciting educational game for children and adults to improve arithmetic skills and have fun!

projects.name: SC2VN - The Esports Visual Novel
projects.blurb: Experience the life of a pro gamer in a visual novel setting. Win fame, battle rivals and make friends. The choices are yours.

projects.name: The Ballads of Reemus 2 - 2D Point and Click Adventure Game
projects.blurb: The next chapter in the Reemus series. A classic, Lucas Arts inspired 2D point and click comedy adventure game for PC/Mac/Linux.

projects.name: "Age of Adventure" Minecraft Roleplaying Server
projects.blurb: A Deep Roleplaying Server where players get to live out their character, shape the world, and have fun. It is truly, an Adventure.

projects.name: TOKYO GAMING SHOWCASE Album Bundle / Event Series
projects.blurb: Indie game-focused 10-album music bundle, streaming concerts, and coverage of Square Sounds and the Tokyo Game Show.

projects.name: Comic ConQuest
projects.blurb: An evil mastermind has enchanted the Con! Team up with your friends and battle your way through the most epic Con ever!

projects.name: Unbreakable: Scorched Earth
projects.blurb: Unbreakable is a new hack and slasher from Labyrinth Interactive, combining RTS and RPG mechanics to create a great cooperative game.

projects.name: AIE Guild Hall: BlizzCon and Beyond
projects.blurb: AIE has a tradition of hosting guild meetups at events like BlizzCon, Dragon Con and more.  Help us continue this tradition.

projects.name: Cornerstone: The Song of Tyrim
projects.blurb:
Wind waker meets Dark Souls
An open world, action-adventure game with an emphasis on physics and player-choice, for PC, Mac and Linux.

projects.name: Knite & The Ghost Lights - Wii U - PC - Mac - Linux
projects.blurb: Knite & the Ghost Lights delivers a mixture of adventure, storytelling, and action from games we know and love, with handcrafted feel.

projects.name: Spark Rising-- Build. Battle. Conquer.
projects.blurb: Build fortresses, defenses, & creatures. Then engage in a 3 way war between mechs, dinos, & the undead!

projects.name: Rebuild: Gangs of Deadsville
projects.blurb: It's Sim City meets The Walking Dead. Rebuild civilization one building at a time in this strategy game for Win, Mac, iOS, & Android.

projects.name: PULSAR: Lost Colony
projects.blurb: Take control of an advanced starship with your friends in search of the mysterious Lost Colony (Windows, Mac and Linux)

projects.name: Cosmic Star Heroine (Sci-Fi/Spy RPG) for PC/Mac/PS4/Vita
projects.blurb: New turn-based RPG from the creators of Cthulhu Saves the World. Inspired by Chrono Trigger, Phantasy Star & Suikoden. PC/Mac/PS4/Vita.

projects.name: Universum: War Front - FPS, RTS, MOBA RPG in one Space Epic
projects.blurb: When you played a RTS or MOBA, did you ever wish to come down and keep the enemy at gunpoint in dynamic battles? In Universum you can!
